HomePage.title: Jakub Stepniewski
HomePage.param1: A passionate fullstack developer with a knack for creating stunning and user-friendly web applications.
HomePage.param2: With expertise in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean and efficient code.
HomePage.param3: I'm a dedicated fullstack developer with a passion for crafting visually appealing and user-friendly web applications. My journey in web development began with a fascination for design and a desire to create seamless digital experiences.
HomePage.param4: Over the years, I've honed my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and have become proficient in modern frameworks like React and Next.js. I thrive on challenges and enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams to bring innovative ideas to life.
HomePage.param5: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring the latest tech trends, contributing to open-source projects, or indulging in my love for photography and travel.
HomePage.projectsSection: Project section is under construction. Please check back later

Education.description1: Completed technical secondary education with a focus on computer science, gaining foundational knowledge in programming, networking, and system administration.
Education.description2: Pursued a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, deepening my understanding of software development, algorithms, and data structures while engaging in various projects and internships.
Education.description3: Completed a Master's degree in Computer Science, specializing in advanced software engineering concepts, machine learning, and system architecture, while contributing to research and development projects.

Experience.description1: Gained practical experience in software development, collaborating with a team to work on real-world projects, enhancing my coding skills, and understanding of the software development lifecycle.
Experience.description2: Worked as a Junior Frontend Developer, contributing to the development and maintenance of web applications using React and Next.js, while collaborating with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality user experiences.
